title: 6 Magical Herbs You Need To Kick Off Spring
author: Sara Coughlin
description: We could all use a little boost for our spring cleaning.
cleaned_text: The clocks have sprung back and the spring fever is setting in. But before you fully embrace the frenetic energy that kicks in around the [vernal equinox](https://www.refinery29.com/en-us/2016/03/106288/vernal-equinox-march-2016), you probably ought to tackle at least little [spring cleaning](https://www.refinery29.com/en-us/2017/03/145502/spring-equinox-ritual-cleansing-tips). Whether you choose to focus your deep cleanse on your wardrobe or personal life, there's a [plant with healing, spiritual properties](https://www.refinery29.com/en-us/best-indoor-house-plants)that can fuel your efforts. While it never hurts to have a sprig of rosemary or a few honeysuckle blossoms in your house, it's especially important to keep plants that are associated with protection, love, and purity handy in the springtime. They'll imbue your living space with a sense of security and the promise of a fresh start. And, if you ask us, those are the exact vibes we're trying to feel as we thaw out after winter.
